cONDOR

Condor bored due he hadn't any to do left his room and walked towards 
the cells



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Sunhawk arrived and straped the prisoner down.
> 
> Sunhawk:  Make sure she's concious but we wouldn't
> want her to be TOO comfortable would we.  Just not
> screaming in pain so we can't get any answers.
> 
> --- catmastero <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > > Sunhawk:  Hey general Talos I caught some Preds
> > digging for 
> > energon
> > > > and this one was put in stasis lock by an
> > energon wave.  I'm not
> > > > sure, but I suspect the other's were as well.  I
> > request 
> > permission
> > > > to lock up the prisoner and take some troops to
> > get the other's 
> > that
> > > > were there.
> > > >
> > > 
> > > {Talos}
> > > 
> > >     Talos nodded looking down at Sunhawks captive,
> > apparently 
> > caught in the
> > > throes of stasis lock more so than battle damage.
> > "Take her to the 
> > brig then
> > > round up Grimlock, Kup and Condor to help you."
> > Turning from the 
> > bot he
> > > opened a comm channel, "Kenzo, report to the brig,
> > Sunhawk is 
> > delivering a
> > > prisoner down there and I'd like you to make sure
> > she's all right, 
> > I want
> > > her functional for when I question her."
> > 
> > Kenzo went to the brig "I hope she isn't a giant
> > lizard or anything" 
> > he said to himself, he had never been instructed to
> > try and heal a 
> > Predacon before but he was sure that it wouldn't be
> > much different 
> > then healing a Maximal or Autobot. He continued to
> > wait for Sunhawk.
> > 
> > 
> 
>
